title: Corporate Sales Intern - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Corporate Sales Intern Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Assisting Sales Executives with sales proposals for existing and potential clients, research of companies and other possible sales opportunities, activating one of our many events....   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
